content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi. I am happy to negotiate with you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I want 1500 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price is significantly higher than what I expect for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.

Terminate
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
